body.name: Portable Mini Ironing Machine, Travel Mini Steam Iron, Handheld Mini Ironing Machine for Clothes, Fast Preheating Steam Dry Ironing for Home and Travel (Beige)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35

features: 【Safe and Portable】: This portable mini ironing machine is designed for travel, effortlessly removing wrinkles from clothes. It operates using a water spraying method, ensuring safety while avoiding the potential risks of steam. Its compact design makes it the perfect travel companion, easily fitting into luggage or backpacks for convenient use on-the-go, providing peace of mind and comfort throughout your journey.

【Wrinkle-Free in Every Angle】: With its pointed tip design and 360-degree rotation feature, you can achieve perfect ironing results from any angle. No more need for an ironing board as you can easily handle narrow areas like buttons, collars, and necklaces.

【5 Minutes Heat-up】: Powered by panel heating technology, this portable mini ironing machine quickly reaches the ideal temperature and maintains consistent heat, ensuring efficient wrinkle removal without damaging your clothes. The smooth surface provides seamless gliding for effortless ironing.

【Easy to Use】: Simply preheat for about 5 minutes, place your garment on the ironing board or any flat surface, use the spray mister to moisten the fabric, and start ironing. It's a user-friendly and convenient process.

【Versatile Application】: This mini ironing machine is suitable for various fabrics, including garments, shirts, curtains, and bedsheets, among others. It not only enhances the appearance of your clothes but also elevates their texture and quality. Transform your garments in just a few minutes.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Instructions for Use: 1.Preheat: Plug the mini iron into a power source and turn on the switch. Wait for approximately 5 minutes until the iron reaches the appropriate working temperature. 2.Add Water: Before use, ensure that there is an adequate amount of clean water in the water tank. You can open the water tank cover, gently pour clean water into the filling hole, and then close the water tank cover tightly. 3.Prepare the Garment: Lay the garment to be ironed flat on an ironing board or any smooth surface. 4.Mist the Fabric: Press the spray button on the iron handle to evenly mist the garment with water. 5.Start Ironing: Grip the iron handle and gently move it back and forth across the garment's surface, ensuring to iron every area. Utilize the iron's pointed tip design and 360-degree rotation feature for detailed areas such as buttons and collars. 6.Finish: Once the garment's surface is completely dry, turn off the iron, unplug it, and allow it to cool naturally. Once the ironing plate is completely cooled, you can fold and store the mini iron.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars This does not work as a steamer
reviews.reviewText: This product does not steam. It gets hot but spits out water. Not useful or fast. I would not recommend it at all. My had water still in the tank - probably was a returned item.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to use on an upcoming trip. Perfect travel size. I did try it out at home first. My only complaint is I couldn’t seem to get all the water out so I put it in a plastic bag before packing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Cheaply made, I sent it back
